title: Low priority queue
body:
Hello, my league name is XoX Pryde and i've been in a low prioirty queue of 20 minutes for more then 8 games now.
Could this be permanent?

replies.body:
No, but if it's been 8 games, it either means you dodged alot even after just getting off a priority punishment... or you finished the timer, went in queue and left queue, that makes it restart like it never counted.


my little bro got it stacked up to 15 games with priority queue, that was on 3 punishments tho, never seen anyone go beyond that
